xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/316639-Dir En Grey: A Knot Of 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iYWvAqGir5XGJBXRKOnoIqNXBCW.jpg With this compilation of live performances, Japan's genre-busting Dir En Grey delivers a fan-friendly package of highlights culled from some of the band's most memorable shows. Filmed over the course of three grueling years on the road, the release also features behind-the-scenes antics from world-famous festivals, including Rock am Ring, Rock im Park, the Wacken Open Air Festival and the Family Values Tour. Dir En Grey: A Knot Of
